pkgmetadata.longdescription: |version| |ci| |coverage| |license|Django Heroku Connect=====================**Django integration Salesforce using Heroku Connect.**Quick Start-----------We have a `Deploy to Heroku sample`_ that gets you started in less than aminute... _`Deploy to Heroku sample`: https://github.com/Thermondo/django-heroku-connect-sampleDocumentation-------------Check out the full documentation at here:https://django-heroku-connect.readthedocs.io/.. |version| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/django-heroku-connect.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/django-heroku-connect/.. |ci| image:: https://travis-ci.com/Thermondo/django-heroku-connect.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.com/Thermondo/django-heroku-connect.. |coverage| image:: https://codecov.io/gh/Thermondo/django-heroku-connect/branch/master/graph/badge.svg :target: https://codecov.io/gh/Thermondo/django-heroku-connect.. |license| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/license-Apache_2-blue.svg :target: LICENSE
